posts.post_content:
Recently discovered and cataloged T206 Jeff Pfeffer with the caption reading Chicaco. Current pop report shows only seven examples encapsulated. BVG 1.5-$450.00.

Check or money order only-no electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. Please email me at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. PMs may not be answered, as my mailbox is often full. Please understand that "I'll take it" takes precedence over requests for additional pictures, ongoing negotiations or other hesitation. Thank you for looking.

Please view my newly updated website with many other new cards here:[url]http://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/url].

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t206pfe-c1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/pferrer%20capt.jpg[/IMG]
That's not "known as" Jeff, it's Francis. The grading company made the error.
I think "Big Jeff" was Francis' nickname.

Ed--As always, you are correct. His name was Francis Xavier "Big Jeff" Pfeffer. Good card, and good luck with the sale!

Cheers,
Mike
